description: Vectric Lua Interface - Complete API Documentation

categories.name: General Global Methods
categories.description: Application-level global methods for version checking and UI interaction

categories.name: Job Related Global Methods
categories.description: Methods for creating, opening, saving, and closing jobs

categories.name: Vector Object Related Global Methods
categories.description: Methods for creating and casting vector objects and contours

categories.name: Component Related Global Methods (Aspire Only)
categories.description: Component and transparency methods available only in Aspire

categories.name: Document Variable Related Global Methods
categories.description: Methods for validating document variable names

categories.name: Data File Locations Related Global Methods
categories.description: Methods for retrieving application data folder locations

categories.name: High Level Objects
categories.description: High level objects like MaterialBlock that provide access to the program's main functionality

categories.name: Geometry Objects
categories.description: Low level geometric primitives (Point2D, Point3D, Vector2D, Box2D)

categories.name: Creating Vectors From Script
categories.description: Objects for creating vector geometry programmatically (Contour, ContourGroup)

categories.name: Toolpath Objects
categories.description: Objects for managing toolpaths and tools
